name: Directory

contact.name: Visit the Github repository for more information

description:
Provides a directory or list of resources that match a specific filter and are ordered in a specified order. A directory is read-only and is not necessarily immutable.Note that the name of the link to
					DirectoryEntry is called "entries" rather than "entry". This allows subclasses to use "entry" without type collisions in the Z.

element.definition:
Provides a directory or list of resources that match a specific filter and are ordered in a specified order. A directory is read-only and is not necessarily immutable.Note that the name of the link to
					DirectoryEntry is called "entries" rather than "entry". This allows subclasses to use "entry" without type collisions in the Z.

element.name: complete
element.short: an indicator that states whether the complete directory listing is included in entries or whether additional retrievals are needed to get the full listing
element.definition: an indicator that states whether the complete directory listing is included in entries or whether additional retrievals are needed to get the full listing.

element.name: numEntries
element.short: the number of entries in this directory segment
element.definition:
the number of entries in this directory segment. Note that this is not the total number of entries in the complete directory listing - just the number of entries in this
							segment.

element.name: prev
element.short: a URI that, when de-referenced, produces the preceding set of entries in the directory
element.definition: a URI that, when de-referenced, produces the preceding set of entries in the directory.

element.name: next
element.short: a URI that, when de-referenced, produces the next set of entries in the directory
element.definition: a URI that, when de-referenced, produces the next set of entries in the directory.

element.name: directoryFilter
element.short: the filter(s) that were applied to generate this directory
element.definition: the filter(s) that were applied to generate this directory

element.name: sortCriteria
element.short: the sort criteria used in the directory
element.definition:
the sort criteria used in the directory. When this is left as optional, there is the possibility that some directories may not be ordered. Some PSMs may chose to make sortCriteria
								mandatory, meaning that all directory listings must reflect some sort order.
